definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a change (from idea of replacing, changing, substituting, cf. Ar., Aram.)—sf. [[חֲלִיפָתִי]] Job 14:14; pl. abs. [[חֲלִיפוֹת]] Ju Jdg 14:19 + 3 t.; cstr. id. Ju Jdg 14:13, 2Ki 5:5; [[חֲלִפוֹת]] Ge 45:22 + 2 t.; [[חֲלִפׂת]] Ge 45:22, Ju Jdg 14:12; —
change of raiment [[שׂמלת]] ´[[ח]] Ge 45:22, Ge 45:22, elsewhere [[בגדים]] ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 14:12, Jdg 14:13, 2Ki 5:5, 2Ki 5:22, 2Ki 5:23; so without [[בגדים]] Ju Jdg 14:19.
revival after death, under fig. of relief from milit. service Job 14:14.

changing, varying, of course of life [[אֲשֶׁר אֵין חֲלִימוֹת לָָמוֹ]] Ps 55:20 of the wicked, with whom are no changings, i.e. they do evil incessantly, steadily (‖[[ולא יׇרְֽאוּ אלהים]]) so Kmp Hu De Sch al.; but the expression is peculiar and obscure; Calv vicissitudes; Hengst discharges; text perhaps corrupt.
